name: Rockettron
description: Rockettron is a retro-themed osciloscope robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its box-like soldier body, rocket arms and legs, and a cat-themed screen, Rockettron stands out from the crowd. It sports a pair of stylish glasses as an additional accessory, which adds to its charisma. Rockettron is a powerful and intelligent robot with an array of skills and abilities.
